channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Macron Says "Worst Scenario" If Iran Quits Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty

media:content.media:description: Macron said that US strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities were "genuinely effective".

item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron said Thursday that US strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities were "genuinely effective" but the "worst-case scenario" would be if Tehran now exits the global non-proliferation treaty.
item.content:encoded: French President Emmanuel Macron said Thursday that US strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities were "genuinely effective" but the "worst-case scenario" would be if Tehran now exits the global non-proliferation treaty.

item.title: Iran Says Damage To Nuclear Sites From War With Israel "Serious"

media:content.media:description: Iran said that it is assessing the conflict's impact.

item.description: Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said Thursday that damage to Iran's nuclear sites from the 12-day war with Israel was "serious", as the country begins assessing the conflict's impact.
item.content:encoded: Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said Thursday that damage to Iran's nuclear sites from the 12-day war with Israel was "serious", as the country begins assessing the conflict's impact.

item.title: New York Mayor Launches Re-Election Bid Slamming Democrats' Mamdani

media:content.media:description: Adams, 64, is now facing off against 33-year-old Zohran Mamdani.

item.description: New York mayor Eric Adams launched his re-election campaign Thursday by taking direct aim at the credentials of his presumed Democratic opponent, Zohran Mamdani.
item.content:encoded: New York mayor Eric Adams launched his re-election campaign Thursday by taking direct aim at the credentials of his presumed Democratic opponent, Zohran Mamdani.

item.title: Deal Done With China, "Very Big One" Coming Up With India: Trump

media:content.media:description: However, Trump did not elaborate on the details of the deal signed with China.

item.description: US President Donald Trump said on Thursday that America has signed a deal with China and hinted that a "very big" deal with India will follow soon.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said on Thursday that America has signed a deal with China and hinted that a "very big" deal with India will follow soon.

item.title: EU Agrees To Renew Russia Sanctions For Another 6 Months

media:content.media:description: The EU's 27 leaders on Thursday agreed to extend sanctions on Russia for another six months.

item.description: The EU's 27 leaders on Thursday agreed to extend sanctions on Russia for another six months, resolving fears that Kremlin-friendly Hungary would let the measures lapse, officials said.
item.content:encoded: The EU's 27 leaders on Thursday agreed to extend sanctions on Russia for another six months, resolving fears that Kremlin-friendly Hungary would let the measures lapse, officials said.

item.title: Iran Says No Plan For New US Nuclear Talks

media:content.media:description: Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi denied that Iran is preparing for new nuclear talks with the US.

item.description: Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi on Wednesday firmly denied speculation Iran is preparing to resume nuclear negotiations with the United States, after the end of a 12-day war with Israel.
item.content:encoded: Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi on Wednesday firmly denied speculation Iran is preparing to resume nuclear negotiations with the United States, after the end of a 12-day war with Israel.

item.title: What Iran's Khamenei Said On Trump's "Surrender" Remark

media:content.media:description: Khamenei declared victory in his first public remark since ceasefire announced with Israel.

item.description: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has strongly criticised US President Donald Trump's call for Iran's surrender, describing it as "too big to come out of his mouth."
item.content:encoded: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has strongly criticised US President Donald Trump's call for Iran's surrender, describing it as "too big to come out of his mouth."

item.title: "Dangerous": Congress Slams Poll Body's Intensive Revision Of Electoral Rolls In Bihar

media:content.media:description: The Congress termed the SIR a "devious and dubious idea disguised as a solution."

item.description: The Congress party has strongly opposed the Election Commission of India's decision to undertake a Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in Bihar ahead of the upcoming 2025 Assembly elections.
item.content:encoded: The Congress party has strongly opposed the Election Commission of India's decision to undertake a Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in Bihar ahead of the upcoming 2025 Assembly elections.

item.title: Have Noted That US Has Updated Travel Advisory For India: Foreign Ministry

media:content.media:description: In the advisory, US urged its citizens to exercise "increased caution" due to crime and rape

item.description: MEA spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said this in response to a query on the advisory issued recently by the US for its citizens travelling to India.
item.content:encoded: MEA spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said this in response to a query on the advisory issued recently by the US for its citizens travelling to India.

item.title: Vessels Near Strait Of Hormuz Transmit Unusual Messages To Prevent Attacks

media:content.media:description: The signals have been used since conflict broke out between Israel and Iran early this month

item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump brokered a ceasefire after 12 days of war but the maritime threat remains elevated, the Joint Maritime Information Center (JMIC) said.
item.content:encoded: U.S. President Donald Trump brokered a ceasefire after 12 days of war but the maritime threat remains elevated, the Joint Maritime Information Center (JMIC) said.

item.title: Anna Wintour Steps Down As Editor Of US Vogue After Nearly 40 Years: Report
item.description: Magazine legend Anna Wintour is stepping down as editor of fashion bible US Vogue after 37 years in the post, US media reported.
item.content:encoded: Magazine legend Anna Wintour is stepping down as editor of fashion bible US Vogue after 37 years in the post, US media reported.

item.title: Donald Trump Defends US Strikes On Iran, Says Nuclear Facilities "Fully Obliterated"

media:content.media:description: Trump rejected an assessment that US inflicted only a marginal setback on Iran's nuclear program

item.description: President Donald Trump on Wednesday rejected an early intelligence assessment that U.S. strikes inflicted only a marginal setback on Iran's nuclear program, insisting that his country's spies did not have the full picture.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump on Wednesday rejected an early intelligence assessment that U.S. strikes inflicted only a marginal setback on Iran's nuclear program, insisting that his country's spies did not have the full picture.

item.title: Should Treat Visa Applications On Merit: India On US Social Media Scrutiny

media:content.media:description: India said that the US should treat the applications of Indian students on the basis of merit

item.description: The US Embassy in India, in a social post had asked Indian students to list all social media usernames or handles of every platform they have used in the last five years on their application form.
item.content:encoded: The US Embassy in India, in a social post had asked Indian students to list all social media usernames or handles of every platform they have used in the last five years on their application form.

item.title: Nepal Government In Minority After Key Party Withdraws Support In Upper House

media:content.media:description: Oli's party said it didn't see any reason for the JSP Nepal to withdraw support.

item.description: A key Madhesi party in Nepal has formally withdrawn support to Prime Minister K P Sharma Oli-led ruling coalition, reducing it to a minority in the National Assembly.
item.content:encoded: A key Madhesi party in Nepal has formally withdrawn support to Prime Minister K P Sharma Oli-led ruling coalition, reducing it to a minority in the National Assembly.

item.title: 20 new bat viruses discovered in China, two closely linked to deadly Nipah and Hendra
item.description: The team raised concerns about transmission to humans due to the proximity of bats to orchards.
item.content:encoded: The team raised concerns about transmission to humans due to the proximity of bats to orchards.

item.title: US Shares Test Footage Of Bunker Busters To Prove Damage In Iran Strikes

media:content.media:description: Pete Hegseth and Gen. Dan Caine described the US strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities

item.description: They played videos of how the bombing took place on the nuclear sites, explaining how the bombers attacked. Unlike other normal bombs, the damage done by a bunker-buster bomb, cannot be seen on the surface level.
item.content:encoded: They played videos of how the bombing took place on the nuclear sites, explaining how the bombers attacked. Unlike other normal bombs, the damage done by a bunker-buster bomb, cannot be seen on the surface level.

item.title: Pickaxe Mountain, Site Near Natanz Facility, May Be Hiding Iran's Uranium

media:content.media:description: Among the 3 sites the US claimed it "obliterated" in strikes was the Fordow nuclear facility. (File)

item.description: The site, located near the Natanz nuclear facility, has drawn renewed attention after satellite images revealed a fortified tunnel system and expanded security perimeter.
item.content:encoded: The site, located near the Natanz nuclear facility, has drawn renewed attention after satellite images revealed a fortified tunnel system and expanded security perimeter.

item.title: Axiom-4 Docking LIVE: Shubhanshu Shukla Becomes 1st Indian Astronaut On ISS

media:content.media:description: Shubhanshu Shukla is India's second astronaut in space.

item.description: Shubhanshu Shukla Axiom-4 Mission Docking LIVE Updates: Shubhanshu Shukla has become India's first astronaut on the International Space Station, as the SpaceX's Axiom-4 mission docked on to the orbital lab.
item.content:encoded: Shubhanshu Shukla Axiom-4 Mission Docking LIVE Updates: Shubhanshu Shukla has become India's first astronaut on the International Space Station, as the SpaceX's Axiom-4 mission docked on to the orbital lab.

item.title: Vehicle Hits Pedestrians Near Primary School In Beijing

media:content.media:description: A 35-year-old man surnamed Han "collided" with people "due to an improper operation".

item.description: A vehicle crashed into pedestrians in an "accident" near a primary school in Beijing, with footage shared online showing young people lying seriously injured in the street.
item.content:encoded: A vehicle crashed into pedestrians in an "accident" near a primary school in Beijing, with footage shared online showing young people lying seriously injured in the street.

item.title: World Health Body Delivers Its First Medical Aid To Gaza Since March 2
item.description: The World Health Organization said that it had delivered its first medical shipment into Gaza since March 2, adding though that the nine truckloads were "a drop in the ocean".
item.content:encoded: The World Health Organization said that it had delivered its first medical shipment into Gaza since March 2, adding though that the nine truckloads were "a drop in the ocean".
